entry.title: LukeGix/CVE-2022-2602
entry.summary:
CVE-2022-2602

CVE-2022-2602

This repository contains exploits for CVE-2022-2602. There are two versions of it:

  • Exploit using userfaultfd technique.
  • Exploit using inode locking technique.

Enjoy! :)

~LukeGix
